allow: Bash(for dir in src src/data src/features src/features/indicators src/models src/execution src/evaluation src/utils)

Bash(python3 -c "
import PyPDF2, os, glob, sys

# Fix encoding
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8'', errors=''replace''\)

base = r''c:\\ML\\intra-trading-system-dynamic\\docs\\offline-articles''
pdfs = glob.glob\(os.path.join\(base, ''**'', ''*.pdf''\), recursive=True\)

# Read remaining PDFs that failed due to encoding
for pdf_path in pdfs:
    relpath = os.path.relpath\(pdf_path, base\)
    if ''Finance_GPT'' in relpath or ''market7'' in relpath:
        continue  # Already read these
    
    print\(f''\\n{""=""*80}''\)
    print\(f''FILE: {relpath}''\)
    print\(''=''*80\)
    try:
        reader = PyPDF2.PdfReader\(pdf_path\)
        print\(f''Pages: {len\(reader.pages\)}''\)
        text = ''''
        for i, page in enumerate\(reader.pages\):
            t = page.extract_text\(\)
            if t:
                text += t + ''\\n''
        if text.strip\(\):
            print\(text[:4000]\)
            if len\(text\) > 4000:
                print\(f''\\n... [TRUNCATED - total {len\(text\)} chars]''\)
        else:
            print\(''[No extractable text]''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
")

import PyPDF2, sys

print\(text[:12000]\)
